00017 #include "MisrRegression.h"
00018 #include "MisrReProject.h"
00019 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 
00038 MTKt_status MtkResampleRegressionCoeff(
00039   const MTKt_RegressionCoeff *Regression_coeff, 
00040   const MTKt_MapInfo *Regression_coeff_map_info, 
00041   const MTKt_MapInfo *Target_map_info, 
00042   MTKt_RegressionCoeff *Regression_coeff_out 
00043 ) 
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status of called routines. */
00047   MTKt_RegressionCoeff regression_coeff_out_tmp = MTKT_REGRESSION_COEFF_INIT;
00048   MTKt_DataBuffer latitude;     /* Array if latitude values for the target grid. */
00049   MTKt_DataBuffer longitude;    /* Array if longitude values for the target grid. */
00050   MTKt_DataBuffer line = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00051                 /* Array of line coordinates in input regression 
00052                    coefficients grid. */
00053   MTKt_DataBuffer sample = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00054                 /* Array of sample coordinates in input regression 
00055                    coefficients grid. */
00056   MTKt_DataBuffer valid_mask_not_used = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00057                 /* Unused valid mask. */
00058 
00059   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00060   /* Argument check: Regression_coeff == NULL                           */
00061   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00062 
00063   if (Regression_coeff == NULL) {
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Regression_coeff == NULL");
00065   }
00066 
00067   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00068   /* Argument check: Regression_coeff_out == NULL                       */
00069   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00070 
00071   if (Regression_coeff_out == NULL) {
00072     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Regression_coeff_out == NULL");
00073   }
00074 
00075   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00076   /* Calculate latitude/longitude for each pixel in the target grid.    */
00077   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00078 
00079   status = MtkCreateLatLon(*Target_map_info, &latitude, &longitude);
00080   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00081   
00082   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00083   /* Calculate line/sample coordinates in the regression coefficient    */
00084   /* grid.                                                              */
00085   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00086 
00087   status = MtkTransformCoordinates(*Regression_coeff_map_info, 
00088                    latitude, longitude, &line, &sample);
00089   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00090 
00091   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00092   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00093   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00094 
00095   MtkDataBufferFree(&latitude);
00096   MtkDataBufferFree(&longitude);
00097 
00098   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00099   /* Resample regression coefficients to target grid.                   */
00100   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00101   
00102   status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&(Regression_coeff->slope), 
00103                        &(Regression_coeff->valid_mask), 
00104                        &line, 
00105                        &sample, 
00106                        -0.5,
00107                        &(regression_coeff_out_tmp.slope),
00108                        &(regression_coeff_out_tmp.valid_mask));
00109   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00110 
00111   status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&(Regression_coeff->intercept), 
00112                        &(Regression_coeff->valid_mask), 
00113                        &line, 
00114                        &sample, 
00115                        -0.5,
00116                        &(regression_coeff_out_tmp.intercept),
00117                        &(valid_mask_not_used));
00118   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00119 
00120   MtkDataBufferFree(&valid_mask_not_used);
00121 
00122   status = MtkResampleCubicConvolution(&(Regression_coeff->correlation),
00123                        &(Regression_coeff->valid_mask),
00124                        &line,
00125                        &sample,
00126                        -0.5,
00127                        &(regression_coeff_out_tmp.correlation),
00128                        &(valid_mask_not_used));
00129   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00130 
00131   MtkDataBufferFree(&valid_mask_not_used);
00132 
00133   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00134   /* Free memory.                                                       */
00135   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00136 
00137   MtkDataBufferFree(&line);
00138   MtkDataBufferFree(&sample);
00139 
00140   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00141   /* Return.                                                            */
00142   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00143 
00144   *Regression_coeff_out = regression_coeff_out_tmp;
00145   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00146 
00147 ERROR_HANDLE:
00148   MtkDataBufferFree(&latitude);
00149   MtkDataBufferFree(&longitude);
00150   MtkDataBufferFree(&line);
00151   MtkDataBufferFree(&sample);
00152   MtkDataBufferFree(&valid_mask_not_used);
00153   return status_code;
00154 }
